alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 3:20PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds and brief heavy rainfall will impact portions of southern Hamilton and Fulton Counties through 400 PM EST... At 318 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Nicks Lake Campground to near Ohio to near Frankfort. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Dolgeville, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Stratford, Caroga Lake Public Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Caroga Lake, Sacandaga Campground, Oppenheim, Bleecker, Hope, Arietta, Benson, Meco, Pinnacle, Lotville, Whitehouse, Rasbach Corner and Knappville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
